text: Forums  Layers and Character Creation Adjustments on Select Realms  WoW Classic   WoW Classic General Discussion  [ Kaivax ](https://us.forums.blizzard.com/en/wow/u/Kaivax) (Kaivax) 14 May 2020 22:19 #1 Layering Disabled in this Region -- May 14  WoW Classic General Discussion  At this time, we’re contracting from two layers to one on all realms in this region that were layered. As we’ve constantly watched and analyzed realm populations over the last few weeks, we’ve seen enough of a recent trend to justify returning to the intended population arrangement for each realm. At the same time, we’ve unlocked any realms that were locked for new character creation. All Paid Character Transfer restrictions have been left in place. We’re going to continue to use our ability t… 63 Likes  Best US east SERVER   Character transfers must be stopped   New player   Best Active Server for Wpvp   With all the queues, wouldn't   Character Transfer error   Free Character Moves Available for Select Realms   Servers unlocking when?   More than 1 layer? Are there 4+ layers?   Why cant I transfer   Transfers to Grobbulus   Unable to transfer Classic character   Unable to transfer Classic character   Realm Transfer - Error   Layering: Few Weeks or Phase 1   Are you allowed to use PCT to make gold?   Where can I go to see which servers have layering   Can i server transfer in classic wow?   Earthfury Update   Earthfury Update   Earthfury Update   You can make a brand new char but you can NOT bring your alt to this server   Here is the GM responce after waiting 3 days   Server transfer error  [ Pmmo-illidan ](https://us.forums.blizzard.com/en/wow/u/Pmmo-illidan) 17 April 2020 23:20 #2 We did it boys! Kaivax, THANK YOU 7 Likes [ Sideous-grobbulus ](https://us.forums.blizzard.com/en/wow/u/Sideous-grobbulus) 17 April 2020 23:21 #3 Bad form. Ban the gd bots. 30 Likes [ Allonsy-whitemane ](https://us.forums.blizzard.com/en/wow/u/Allonsy-whitemane) 17 April 2020 23:22 #4 Can you please elaborate on what this means for World Boss spawns? 6 Likes [ Yssim-whitemane-933461 ](https://us.forums.blizzard.com/en/wow/u/Yssim-whitemane-933461) 17 April 2020 23:23 #5 You get a world boss! And you get a world boss ! There’s only 2 layers. Relax. 1 World boss up at a time. 3 Likes [ Andrew-netherwind ](https://us.forums.blizzard.com/en/wow/u/Andrew-netherwind) 17 April 2020 23:23 #6 Weeeeeeee! More things are happening! [ Malms-skeram ](https://us.forums.blizzard.com/en/wow/u/Malms-skeram) 17 April 2020 23:24 #8 Just here to get likes on my post 23 Likes [ Shadows-grobbulus ](https://us.forums.blizzard.com/en/wow/u/Shadows-grobbulus) 17 April 2020 23:24 #9 Kaivax: Additionally, we have also restricted character creation and transfers to the Grobbulus realm. Thank you!!! 9 Likes [ Bonerover-stormreaver-904154 ](https://us.forums.blizzard.com/en/wow/u/Bonerover-stormreaver-904154) 17 April 2020 23:25 #10 Let the layer jumping being. 3 Likes [ Xavus-herod ](https://us.forums.blizzard.com/en/wow/u/Xavus-herod) 17 April 2020 23:27 #11 Oh dear. The black lotus. Wasn’t Earthfury a medium pop server? 1 Like [ Tanirs-fairbanks ](https://us.forums.blizzard.com/en/wow/u/Tanirs-fairbanks) 17 April 2020 23:26 #12 Please turn off layering for Fairbanks. 7 Likes [ Dunston-herod ](https://us.forums.blizzard.com/en/wow/u/Dunston-herod) 17 April 2020 23:27 #13 How does this change world bosses? [ Heavyweight-proudmoore ](https://us.forums.blizzard.com/en/wow/u/Heavyweight-proudmoore) (Heavyweight) 17 April 2020 23:27 #14 Thanks for keeping Grobbulus layer free 5 Likes [ Kunou-ragnaros ](https://us.forums.blizzard.com/en/wow/u/Kunou-ragnaros) 17 April 2020 23:27 #15 Disgusting. You are ruining the game because of your incompetence to solve population problems at the start… 35 Likes [ Mivh-antonidas ](https://us.forums.blizzard.com/en/wow/u/Mivh-antonidas) 17 April 2020 23:28 #16 What about layering for realms that are super populated on side. There are certain advantages to having layers. All realms should be layered if any are. Farming for AQ event? Layers op. Implement connected realms. Split the giant realms into two realms then reconnect them. The smaller realms connect multiples to make larger well balanced. The heavy horde, connect to heavy alliance. Connected realms are the solution here, not layers. 3 Likes [ Thisperia-boulderfist ](https://us.forums.blizzard.com/en/wow/u/Thisperia-boulderfist) 17 April 2020 23:30 #18 Would you consider doing a short free character transfer away from layered realms for those of us who don’t want to play on a server with layers? 7 Likes [ Morgânosh-myzrael ](https://us.forums.blizzard.com/en/wow/u/Morgânosh-myzrael) 17 April 2020 23:31 #19 Lovely. And if that list grows…then what? Is there a plan if more servers get added? But more importantly, are you guys gonna do anything to address all the Non-RP-ers you encouraged to migrate to Grobb that are effectively destroying the once lovely community we all had? Your last post said this was actually important to you guys as well, so I’m legitimately curious if you have any plan on addressing this? We only have ONE RP-PvP Server. 6 Likes [ Hurs-arugal ](https://us.forums.blizzard.com/en/wow/u/Hurs-arugal) 17 April 2020 23:31 #20 So what happens with the world bosses? Is there somewhere where you have explained it? [ Ôwns-proudmoore ](https://us.forums.blizzard.com/en/wow/u/Ôwns-proudmoore) (Ôwns) 17 April 2020 23:31 #21 Morgânosh: Lovely. Can’t wait to watch that list grow…then what? Is there a plan if more servers get added? No chance of this happening. Once the pandemic is over they can safely remove layers. 2 Likes [ Vb-whitemane ](https://us.forums.blizzard.com/en/wow/u/Vb-whitemane) 17 April 2020 23:32 #22 I have some questions if anyone knows the answer: * Does this mean more herbs/ore over all, or are they split between layers? * How does this affect rare mob spawning like world dragons or Prince Nazjak? * Do world buffs apply on all layers or just the layer they are turned in on? next page → Home Categories FAQ/Guidelines Terms of Service Privacy Policy Powered by Discourse, best viewed with JavaScript enabled [Skip to Main post_text.surface_form: Layering Disabled in this Region -- May 14  WoW Classic General Discussion  At this time, we’re contracting from two layers to one on all realms in this region that were layered. As we’ve constantly watched and analyzed realm populations over the last few weeks, we’ve seen enough of a recent trend to justify returning to the intended population arrangement for each realm. At the same time, we’ve unlocked any realms that were locked for new character creation. All Paid Character Transfer restrictions have been left in place. We’re going to continue to use our ability t…
We did it boys! Kaivax, THANK YOU
Bad form. Ban the gd bots.
Can you please elaborate on what this means for World Boss spawns?
You get a world boss! And you get a world boss ! There’s only 2 layers. Relax. 1 World boss up at a time.
Weeeeeeee! More things are happening!
Just here to get likes on my post
Kaivax: Additionally, we have also restricted character creation and transfers to the Grobbulus realm. Thank you!!!
Let the layer jumping being.
Oh dear. The black lotus. Wasn’t Earthfury a medium pop server?
Please turn off layering for Fairbanks.
How does this change world bosses?
Thanks for keeping Grobbulus layer free
Disgusting. You are ruining the game because of your incompetence to solve population problems at the start…

What about layering for realms that are super populated on side. There are certain advantages to having layers. All realms should be layered if any are. Farming for AQ event? Layers op. Implement connected realms. Split the giant realms into two realms then reconnect them. The smaller realms connect multiples to make larger well balanced. The heavy horde, connect to heavy alliance. Connected realms are the solution here, not layers.
Would you consider doing a short free character transfer away from layered realms for those of us who don’t want to play on a server with layers?

Lovely. And if that list grows…then what? Is there a plan if more servers get added? But more importantly, are you guys gonna do anything to address all the Non-RP-ers you encouraged to migrate to Grobb that are effectively destroying the once lovely community we all had? Your last post said this was actually important to you guys as well, so I’m legitimately curious if you have any plan on addressing this? We only have ONE RP-PvP Server.
So what happens with the world bosses? Is there somewhere where you have explained it?
Morgânosh: Lovely. Can’t wait to watch that list grow…then what? Is there a plan if more servers get added? No chance of this happening. Once the pandemic is over they can safely remove layers.

I have some questions if anyone knows the answer: * Does this mean more herbs/ore over all, or are they split between layers? * How does this affect rare mob spawning like world dragons or Prince Nazjak? * Do world buffs apply on all layers or just the layer they are turned in on?
